Class Rate

java.lang.Object
ru.soloviev.domain.models.Rate
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRate
public class Rate extends Object implements IRate
Class that have all information of rates inside bank

  • Constructor Details

    • Rate

      public Rate(BigDecimal limit, BigDecimal debitPercent, BigDecimal commission, DepositInformation depositPercentInformation) throws RateException
      Constructor for rate
      Parameters:
      limit - limit for one payment for unverified clients
      debitPercent - percent for debit accounts, 1 percent per year - "0.01"
      commission - money that will additionally pay if credit account have negative balance
      depositPercentInformation - all information about deposit accounts
      Throws:
      RateException - if limit, commission or percent is negative
